net.proteusframework.cms.dao

Class CmsFrontendDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.dao.DAOHelper
      • net.proteusframework.cms.dao.CmsFrontendDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.proteusframework.internet.http.SiteLoader, InitializingBean

    @Repository(value="cmsFrontendDAO")
public class CmsFrontendDAO
extends net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.dao.DAOHelper
implements net.proteusframework.internet.http.SiteLoader
    DAO for the frontend.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • getOperationalSite

        @Nullable
public CmsSite getOperationalSite()
        Get the operational site.

        Operational in this case means the site in which you are currently operating on.
        If the current site is categorized as a "backend" site, then the currently selected site is returned from the PreferencesUtil; otherwise, the Site associated to the requested Hostname is returned.

        This method can only be used from within an HTTP request.
        Specified by:
        getOperationalSite in interface net.proteusframework.internet.http.SiteLoader
        Returns:
        the operational site or null.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called outside an HTTP request.

      • getOrganizationsUserAdministers

        public List<net.proteusframework.users.model.Organization> getOrganizationsUserAdministers(net.proteusframework.users.model.Principal principal,
                                                                                  @Nullable
                                                                                  String search)
                                                                                    throws CmsException
        Get organizations visible to the specified Principal. This is *not* performed in a transaction.
        Parameters:
        principal - the principal to lookup sites for.
        search - optional search string.
        Returns:
        the organizations that are tied to sites that the principal can administer. If principal is null then empty list, will never return null
        Throws:
        CmsException - if an error occurs.
